title: Handaxe Proficiency
content:
Handaxe Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with handaxes. Requirements Dwarf

Handaxe Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with handaxes.

Handaxe Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
